live.name: *REQUIRED* name of the live
live.location: location (city, or region, or island) of the live
live.lastState: date of the state update, format 'YYYY-MM-DD', example '2023-11-15'
live.lastActive: (offline state only) date of the last active state, format 'YYYY-MM-DD'
live.lastUpdate: date of the last json update, format 'YYYY-MM-DD'
